mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_op_shelf_info( id, `name`, description, `type`, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{description}, #{type}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_op_shelf_info SET `name` = #{name}, description = #{description}, `type`=#{type}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
